description: Easy to use and succeeds where similar programs have failed. It only gets 4 stars because it requires the menu button to be enable in your window manager. It is not an obvious requirement if you don't have the menu button enabled already and not all window managers make button layout easily accessible.

If you choose Debian for the first copy?... you are forever stuck with Debian. Choose Puppy?... that's it. You'll never copy a different os to a USB drive. It will not let you change after the initial selection the first time you run the program.
Pretty major flaw, once you choose an ISO file good luck switching it.
summary: No way to change the ISO file.. seriously?

description: To those who think you cannot choose an ISO. Yes you can, I also found it unintuitive, click the name tag in the status bar.
